input.sentences: the kids and i always dress up for halloween .
getting the pumpkin ready is always a joy .
the pumpkin seeds are put to the side to let dry out .
once the inside is all cleaned out it 's time to start cutting the design .
at the end what a dramatic difference from the beginning.one light and it 's glowing in the dark .
output.sentences: Joseph was upset that Tina showed up to the Halloween party dressed as a witch instead of Luigi.
He ignored her for the rest of the evening, choosing to hang out with his boring parents, who didn't dress up at all.
Nevertheless, they decided to scoop out the guts of a pumpkin.
Joseph's dad did all the carving, but Joseph supervised.
By the end of the evening, they carved a beautiful jackolantern.
